meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nick Wawrykow Staci Huffman Dave Leffler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7880.

td.p: Nick Wawrykow, a graduate student from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Staci Huffman, a certified public accountant from Nine Mile Falls, Washington
Dave Leffler, a retired police officer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 4-day cash winnings total $100,102)

tr.td: DAY ONE
ALL ABOUT AUTHORS
GET "HIP"
HEELS
FACES
PRO WRESTLING
